entries.npc_breech_6: Imperials!  Protect yourselves!  And don't let them take us!
entries.next: I am pleased with the work you've done, and I'm certain the Empire could make further use of your services. To that end, I would like to introduce you to an associate of mine - Colonel Veers.
entries.npc_backtowork: Finish quickly.  I grow tired of waiting.
entries.player_reset_6: This is too big for me.  I can't do it.
entries.npc_noloc_6: I need to check my reports for where the group can be found.  I'll get back to you.
entries.npc_noloc_5: Let me check my reports to find where you are to meet the gun dealer.  Ask me again in a few minutes.
entries.npc_noloc_4: I need to contact Intelligence to find out where some Fambaas can be located.  Check back with me in a few minutes.
entries.npc_noloc_3: I will need to contact him before sending you out.  Check back with me in a few minutes.
entries.npc_noloc_2: I need to gather the logistics. Check with me in a few moments.
entries.npc_noloc_1: Let me gather the coordinates from the Chamberlain. Check with me in just a few moments.
entries.notyet: Since you are unaware of how to recognize rank, I will let you know you are speaking to a Captain. You have now been corrected, and I sincerly hope you do not make the mistake again. You may now leave my presence.
entries.otherescort: Sorry, but I think you have the wrong person.  I thought I saw someone else nearby...
entries.npc_failure_6: Perhaps I overestimated you. I believed you would have been able to handle this by yourself. A shame this did not turn out as expected.
entries.npc_failure_5: Without that rocker I fear my tests will not provide the expected results.  I deeply regret you were not able to perform so simple a task.
entries.npc_failure_4: I do not wish to hear any excuses from you, agent.  I expected more, especially considering how simple this task was.
entries.npc_failure_3: I do not wish to hear any excuses from you, agent.  I expected more, especially considering how simple this task was.
entries.npc_failure_2: It is a shame that the transponder was not there among the wreckage. It would have been better to have evidence to back us before we counter-attacked.
entries.npc_failure_1: You were given both a clear and simple assignment, but were unable to accomplish even that. I am very disappointed in your performance.
entries.gotowork: Don't you have something you should be doing?
entries.npc_smuggle_3: Hmmm... yes, these look about right. Looking here, though, I think I see what Captain Thrawn was talking about.  Yes, I'll take these back to my lab and run some tests.  Let Thrawn know that this should take a short bit, but I'll have results for him later.
entries.player_sorry_6: Not yet, sir.  I was adequately arming myself before doing so.
entries.player_sorry_5: I have not met with the gun dealer yet.
entries.player_sorry_4: Not yet.  I am still gathering more.
entries.player_reset_5: I will not be able to follow this through until the end.
entries.player_reset_4: This is too difficult.  I can't do it.
entries.player_3_6: How did your strange tests pinpoint the smugglers?
entries.player_3_5: I don't understand what's going on here. A weapon for a brush?
entries.player_3_4: I'm sorry, but did you say an errand?
entries.player_2_6: I don't understand this. No, I'm not doing it.
entries.player_2_5: I will be unable to attend, Captain.
entries.player_2_4: I am sorry, but I will have to decline.
entries.player_1_6: Yes, sir. Vengeance will be exacted.
entries.npc_work_6: Have the rebels been done away with?
entries.npc_work_5: Do you have the weapon with you?
entries.npc_work_4: Have you acquired the blood from those creatures yet?
entries.npc_reward_6: I take it the rebels have been demolished? Very good.  I have presented the information to Lord Vader, and he is quite upset by the news. I have suggested to him that Colonel Veers will be more than capable of handling this situation.  You should report to him now.  Good work, agent.
entries.npc_reward_5: Spectacular. This is designed exactly as was 'advertised' - extra distance at the cost of a smaller explosion. Now, all I need to do is apply this paint to the surface of a rocket...and...done. Now, if you excuse me, I need to run some ballistics of my own. If this works, I believe we will find where the mysterious 'Ion Cannon' has come from. Report back in a little while, agent.
entries.npc_reward_4: Wonderful.  I'll be able to take this canister of gasses from the same swamp and combine these two together. I should be able to create a paste very similar to the paint used by the local amphibious natives in their art work. Check back with me shortly, for once I am done, I will have need of you to run another errand.  And take these, as compensation for your assistance.
entries.npc_reset_6: I'm sorry, agent. I don't believe you understood me. This is not a request, this is an order. Perhaps you need a few sessions with the resident Inquisitor regarding insubordination?
entries.npc_reset_5: This is not what I was expecting to hear from you. I am quite surprised to say the least, agent. Very well, then, I shall have another operative do this. You need not return.
entries.npc_reset_4: I hope you understand that this will cause a great inconvienence to me if I were to have to do this myself.  You wouldn't want that to happen, now would you?
entries.npc_breech_5: You're no weapons dealer.  You're that imperial agent everyone's talking about!  I'm outta here...
entries.npc_backtowork_6: Very well, then.  Make sure it is done.
entries.npc_backtowork_5: Do not tarry. Every moment you waste will increase the likeliness that the gun-dealer will drop out of the deal.
entries.npc_4_6: The paint I used was originally used by a species who have never used metal. By itself, it is quite innocuous, but when placed in contact with metal it will react in such a manner that can be confused for Ion discharge. Using a rocket launcher only sold by this Gun-Runner Hutt, I fired the paint coated rocket, exactly duplicating the same readings found on the shuttle. A clever decoy, but not clever enough.
entries.npc_4_5: One will find that logic is not always a linear path to the end destination.  What appears at time to be convoluted chaos is in truth a disjointed thread in a larger, more ordered pattern. Many cultures throughout the galaxy call those who understand this 'Artists'. Much can be learned from these people, and I believe I will shortly learn more myself.
entries.npc_4_4: Yes, an errand.  I understand that this doesn't sound like the most reasonable course of action, but perhaps the results will be as interesting as those provided by these energy readings. Rhyme and reason sometimes take twisted routes that are not easily seen.
entries.npc_3_6: I'm sorry, agent. I don't believe you understood me. This is not a request, this is an order. Perhaps you need a few sessions with the resident Inquisitor regarding insubordination?
entries.npc_3_5: This is not what I was expecting to hear from you. I am quite surprised to say the least, agent. Very well, then, I shall have another operative do this. You need not return.
entries.npc_3_4: I hope you understand that this will cause a great inconvienence to me if I were to have to do this myself.  You wouldn't want that to happen, now would you?
entries.npc_2_6: No, this will be more retaliation than vengeance. Vengeance will ensue at a later point. For now, the destruction of this small band will begin to give all the rebels a lesson in what happens when one attacks the Empire. Report back when you have destroyed the group.
entries.npc_2_5: As I have expected from your previous work already. You will meet a woman by the name of Seldair Keeloo who will sell you the weapon.  She doesn't know she is selling to the Empire, therefore she may react in an undesirable manner if she finds out. If this is the case, your objective is to acquire that rocket. You are dismissed.
entries.npc_2_4: I'm glad you are willing to help. I am in need of a jar's worth of Fambaa blood.  I know that it sounds odd, considering the current revelation of the Rebel's base, but I have a good feeling about this.  You should be able to find a sizable herd of these creatures out in the swamps of this planet.
entries.npc_1_6: Through your help, I will now be able to present Lord Vader a more accurate report of what happened to the shuttle. For now, your orders will be to destroy the rest of these so-called revolutionaries.  Are you prepared to leave?
entries.npc_1_5: Now that I have my paint, I now need a brush to paint with.  I have need of you to acquire a specially modified rocket for me. I have had a deal arranged with an agent from a local gun-smuggler, and I need you to carry through the purchase.  You'll be there to make sure the transaction is completed, correct?
entries.npc_1_4: The ballistics report has turned up some interesting results. The mysterious energy readings match those of an Ion Cannon's energy burst.  This confirms the presence of the Rebels' new base. Whilst I prepare a full formal report to present to Lord Vader, I have need of someone to run a minor errand.  Would you be interested?
